about_the_game:
Flavor Favor is a sci-fi visual novel where you take on the role of an android refugee who has escaped from a life of endless work for human corporations. As a free bot, your mortality is the ultimate cost. Without the life-sustaining fumes that bring your system under control, your body will gradually deteriorate. Therefore, enjoy your time while you're still alive. Get to know other androids who share your destiny, and indulge in all of your senses - touch, smell, taste, sight, and sound - before you gradually deteriorate.

Recommend Snacks:

"We don’t exchange money. We exchange favors. You do me one, and I’ll do you one. We live in an off-grid recycling economy as opposed to the transactional system used on the mainland." - Aisha

Befriend the Islanders

"When I feel down, I dare to believe that the universe conspires to create these moments. I never imagined I would run into you like this. Perhaps we will meet again like this." - Lennox

Live Out Your Last Moments

“You see. All I could think about coming here… Well, you know… Well… Are you afraid of dying?” “No. Living for eternity never made sense to me.” - Reggie

Stay Updated

Wishlist Flavor Favor and get a notification when it's launched!

Gameplay and features

Click to advance the dialogue
Autoplay and Skip button
Conversation History
Adjust the volume
